alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Milwaukee, Racine, eastern Waukesha and Kenosha Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Menomonee Falls to Antioch. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Kenosha, Racine, Waukesha, West Allis, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Greenfield, Menomonee Falls, Oak Creek, Mount Pleasant, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Pleasant Prairie, Cudahy, Whitefish Bay, Greendale, Pewaukee and Brown Deer. People attending The Bristol Renaissance Faire , Mexican Fiesta in Milwaukee , and The ARCA National Tour at State Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
